title: Baldur's Gate II: Enhanced Edition Soundtrack
description: Experience the original soundtrack for Baldur's Gate II and Throne of Bhaal composed by Michael Hoenig, Inon Zur, and Howard Drossin, including 15 new tracks by Sam Hulick.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# New & Original Tracks
<!--text-->
Experience the unforgettable original soundtracks for _Baldur's Gate II_ and _Throne of Bhaal_ composed by Michael Hoenig, Inon Zur, and Howard Drossin, including 15 new tracks by Sam Hulick.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Original Composers
<!--text-->
Michael Hoenig is an emmy-nominated composer who has written music for dozens of science fiction and horror films, including The Blob (1988). 

Inon Zur is an award-winning composer of orchestral scores for video games, movies and television. In 2009, he won a Hollywood Music in Media Award for his work on the _Dragon Age: Origins_ soundtrack.

Howard Drossin is a renowned composer for video games, film and television. Credits include work on the _Sonic the Hedgehog_ franchise, and film scores for Director Spike Lee.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# 15 New Tracks
<!--text-->
The _Baldur's Gate II: Enhanced Edition Official Soundtrack_ includes 34 tracks that were not previously released with the original gameâ€” plus 15 brand new tracks composed by Sam Hulick for the  Enhanced Edition. 

Sam Hulick is a Chicago based, BAFTA nominated and NBC News award winning composer for film, television and interactive media, best known for creating the signature music for BioWare's blockbuster sci-fi franchise _Mass Effect_.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# 82 Tracks
<!--text-->
All 82 tracks (Including 34 that have previously never been released) are provided in both MP3 and lossless FLAC format, for your listening pleasure. 

Total Length: 113 min, 50 sec.
